document_data.name: ''Lathalshlal''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lathalshal''''' was a legendary enchanted [[spear]] created on the island of [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Description: This spear measured more than {{SI|8|ft|long=yes}} in length. Its head was blue [[steel]] and the shaft was shaped from white wood.
document_data.Powers: ''Lathalshal'' functioned as a +5 weapon against enemies. However, the spear's [[magic]] was especially deadly against [[baatezu]], [[yugoloth]]s, and [[tanar'ri]].
